column1: PT sentence: Quero café e água.
RU sentence: Я хочу кофе и воду.
EN sentence: I want coffee and water.
PT sentence: Podemos ir hoje ou amanhã.
RU sentence: Мы можем пойти сегодня или завтра.
EN sentence: We can go today or tomorrow.
EN sentence: I want to help
PT sentence: Eu também quero ir.
RU sentence: Я тоже хочу пойти.
EN sentence: I also want to go.
PT sentence: Fiquei em casa porque estava doente.
EN sentence: I stayed home because I was sick.
EN sentence: Let's do it this way.
RU sentence: В итоге всё получилось.
EN sentence: On the other hand
RU sentence: В целом это работает хорошо.
PT sentence: Depois vemos o resto.
EN sentence: Then we'll see the rest.
RU sentence: В данный момент я не могу говорить.
RU sentence: На самом деле я согласен.
PT sentence: Talvez seja melhor esperar.
EN sentence: Maybe it's better to wait.
EN sentence: It will probably rain.
PT sentence: Parece uma boa ideia.
EN sentence: It seems like a good idea.
